name: Triangle MicroWorks SCADA Data Gateway验证缺失漏洞
description: Triangle MicroWorks SCADA Data Gateway是美国Triangle MicroWorks公司的一款SCADA数据网关产品。Triangle MicroWorks SCADA Data Gateway存在验证缺失漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞执行任意代码。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://www.trianglemicroworks.com/products/scada-data-gateway/what's-new
patch: Triangle MicroWorks SCADA Data Gateway验证缺失漏洞的补丁
